body.description: Sleek, powerful, and lightweight, our GS-3700MT is the way to go for any camping trip. With a smooth metal body and enamel-coated drip pan, our stove ensures an easy and enjoyable cooking experience. This iconic little stove delivers 10,000 BTU, making it a wonderful addition to everything from camping gear to an emergency kit!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us One of life's most endearing privileges is the experience of spending time with another and nothing brings people closer together like cooking outdoors. Here at Gas One, it is our commitment to do just that. Founded as a family company, we truly understand the value of spending time with one another. It is because of this underlying reason our foremost priority is to deliver our line of quality products to re-create the family environment, making it easier to enjoy the outdoors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Reliable Culinary Companion: Portable Butane Gas Stove Delivers Excellence Anywhere!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Portable Butane Gas Stove, and I must say, it has quickly become an essential tool for my outdoor cooking adventures. Whether I'm camping, picnicking, or simply cooking in my backyard, this stove has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance and convenience.First and foremost, the stove's portability is unmatched. It's compact and lightweight, making it incredibly easy to carry and store. I love how it folds up neatly, allowing me to pack it along with my camping gear without taking up much space. It has become my go-to cooking companion whenever I'm on the move.When it comes to performance, this butane gas stove delivers outstanding results. The flame is adjustable, providing precise control over the heat intensity. I've cooked everything from delicate simmering sauces to boiling water for pasta, and the stove has consistently delivered even heat distribution. I was pleasantly surprised by how quickly it reaches the desired temperature, allowing me to cook efficiently.Safety is always a top priority, especially when dealing with gas stoves. I appreciate the built-in safety features of this portable stove. It has a reliable ignition system that ensures a quick and hassle-free start-up. Additionally, the sturdy design and wide base provide stability while cooking, minimizing any risk of accidents.Another aspect that impressed me is the fuel efficiency of this butane gas stove. It uses butane canisters, which are readily available and affordable. I was pleasantly surprised by how long a single canister lasts, even with extended cooking sessions. This not only saves me money but also reduces the hassle of frequently refilling the fuel.Cleaning and maintenance are a breeze with this stove. The removable drip tray collects any spills or food residue, making it easy to wipe clean. The stove's smooth surface also simplifies the overall cleaning process, ensuring that it's always ready for the next culinary adventure.Whether I'm grilling vegetables, boiling water for a cup of tea, or simply enjoying the convenience of cooking outdoors, the Portable Butane Gas Stove has consistently delivered excellence. Its reliability, portability, and impressive performance make it a must-have for anyone who loves outdoor cooking. I highly recommend this stove to fellow adventurers and cooking enthusiasts who appreciate quality and convenience in their culinary experiences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cooking outdoors
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to cook outside on trips. It's convenient and just works. Outputs a good amount of heat. Grills korean bbq ribs nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small camp stove gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: It’s work well for a small stove. Using for a small Korean bbq grill top. Works nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love This Little Stove
reviews.reviewText: Since I live in Florida where hurricanes and tropical storms are a regular occurrence this stove can come in very handy in the event of a power outage. Fortunately, in North Florida where I live that hasn't happened in a while but I find this stove is nice to have for other uses. Can also be used for camping or picnics. It's lightweight and easily portable in the included plastic carrying case. Works well with all types of pots and pans just be sure not to use too large a pan that extends over to the canister area or it can cause the butane canister to overheat. Although the manual states this stove is for outdoor use only, I have used it occasionally indoors with no issues. If used indoors just make sure you have plenty of ventilation and don't use it for extended periods of time. I'm not recommending you use it indoors just sharing my experience.This stove is very easy to operate. Just install the canister like in the picture and align the notch on the canister with the tab on the stove, close the lid and ignite by turning the control knob all the way down. The piezo igniter will light the stove so you don't need matches or a lighter. The control knob makes it easy to adjust the flame. Since I have a glass top electric stove this thing comes in handy when I need the quick high heat range of a gas burner. It's also good for seasoning your cast iron or carbon steel pans outside to avoid smoke buildup in your house.The only downside is finding the butane canisters at a reasonable price. They can be pricey on Amazon and hard to find at major retail stores. Have had some luck at Walmart but it's hit or miss as to whether they are in stock. Since these stoves are a staple in Asian cultures you may be able to purchase canisters at a local Asian food market but I've yet to explore that option.The included case has the same labeling on the top & bottom so to make sure I open on the top side of the stove I placed a couple of marks with a sharpie to remind me of the orientation as shown in the picture. These stoves are not expensive and great to have around in the event of a power outage. I think every household should have at least one. Gives you peace of mind that you don't have to miss your morning coffee, breakfast or other meals because of a power outage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: By far my favorite stove. Igniter makes it a breeze to use. Great heat output and you can simmer without burning your food. Lightweight and portable. Could use a better case since the latches aren't super reliable but overall, it's one of the better single burner stoves out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for a good price
reviews.reviewText: This was actually exactly what we were looking for. We mainly use this for HotPot dinners and some outdoor cooking. It was easy to set up and use. The only con is that I wish it had a case to store it in or some kind of lid to cover the cooktop when storing. Other than that, we are happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable stove.
reviews.reviewText: Great little stove. This is a repeat purchase, so yes I would buy it again. Love the performance and simplicity. The carrying case is a nice bonus to keep your stove looking new. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a wonderful little stove!
reviews.reviewText: I love this little stove! It works great (x2 camping trips) and heats water quickly so that we can have coffee in the morning! We've also used it to make eggs, sausage, heat taco meat, and more.
